data.event: The town of McLean was laid out on June 22, 1855 by Franklin Price.
Price (February 21, 1821 - July 25, 1908) was born in Chester Valley, Pennsylvania.
Price came to Bloomington in 1849, he worked as a clerk and newspaper writer and was elected mayor of Bloomington in 1855 and again in 1856, serving until 1858.

event.title: was elected mayor of Bloomington in 1855

data.event: Price came to Bloomington in 1849, he worked as a clerk and newspaper writer and was elected mayor of Bloomington in 1855 and again in 1856, serving until 1858.
